title.narrative: Devolution Sector Working Group (DSWG) coordination documents with joint priorities, results and accountability framework.
Capacity development of Kenya School of Government (KSG) faculty on face to face (F2F) and online delivery of learning offerings.

target.value: Design and delivery of one pilot blended learning offering to 20+ counties. 20% KSG faculty trained in the design and delivery of blended learning offerings.
Design and delivery of 2+ blended learning offerings to 25+ counties. 50% KSG faculty trained in the design and delivery of blended learning offerings.
Design and delivery of 4+ blended learning offerings to 35+ counties. 75% KSG faculty trained in the design and delivery of blended learning offerings.
Design and delivery of 5+ blended learning offerings to 40+ counties. All KSG faculty trained in the design and delivery of blended learning offerings.
Design and delivery of 6+ blended learning offerings to 40+ counties. All KSG faculty and 50% of associated faculty trained in the design and delivery of blended learning offerings.
